required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Visual Maturation in Premature Newborns According to Factors Influencing Its Development
clinical_study.official_title: Visual Maturation in Premature Newborns According to Factors Influencing Its Development

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose is to describe the level of visual maturation of premature newborns at term equivalent age.
The secondary purpose is to determine factors associated to an altered level of visual maturation, through an exploratory approach.

primary_outcome.measure: Measurement of Visual Acuity by Baby Vision Cards
primary_outcome.description: Baby Vision cards are the French equivalent of Teller Cards - The measurement will be done at the term equivalent age : at the inclusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Control of the Retina by Retinal Camera
secondary_outcome.description: Use of Retcam to diagnose Retinopathy of Prematurity - The measurement will be done at the term equivalent age : at the inclusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Measurement of cycloplegic refraction by mydriaticum 0.5%
secondary_outcome.description: The measurement will be done at the term equivalent age : at the inclusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Presence, absence of light reflex by clinical evaluation
secondary_outcome.description: The measurement will be done at the term equivalent age : at the inclusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Presence, absence or abnormality of visual fixation by clinical observation
secondary_outcome.description: The measurement will be done at the term equivalent age : at the inclusion

secondary_outcome.measure: Analysis of visual cortex with MRI
secondary_outcome.description: Determinants of indices of cerebral volume in former very premature infants and their relation to visual maturation. The measurement will be done at the term equivalent age : at the inclusion

study_pop.textblock: Premature babies, born before 33 weeks of amenorrhea and hospitalized at CHRU Nancy, evaluated at term equivalent age.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Infants born before 33 weeks of amenorrhea and hospitalized at CHRU Nancy
Exclusion Criteria:
- Parental opposition
- Ocular malformation
- Face malformation
- Cranial stenosis
- Chromosomal abnormality

overall_official.affiliation: Maternité Régionale Universitaire A. Pinard CHRU Nancy
